enumParam.name: protein_coding_only
enumParam.help: Should only protein coding genes be returned?

stringParam.name: single_gene_id
stringParam.help: Gene IDs (locus tags) are quite different for each species. We use the gene IDs provided by the sequence generator.

stringParam.name: min_mutual_information_score
stringParam.help: Enter the minimum mutual information score to report similarities. The score range is from 0.472 to 1.67

stringParam.name: min_num_query_matches
stringParam.help: Enter the minimum number of queries you want to match to your genes. If you input 5 genes ids for your query and enter 5 minimum number of queries then the only genes returned would be ones that all 5 queries match

flatVocabParam.name: tfbs_name
flatVocabParam.help: The image displayed below indicates the binding site for the chosen transcription factor.

stringParam.name: tfbs_distance
stringParam.help: Enter the maximum distance you want to allow the center of the peak to be from the 5' end of the gene. Note that the larger the value entered here (3000 bp maximum) the greater the chance for aberrant results.

enumParam.name: tfbs_pvalue
enumParam.help: The p value cutoff for this search. The P value is the probability that the binding site with that score would match at that position given the input DNA (inter-genic and telomeric regions). For example, a P value of 1X10<sup>-4</sup> means that you would find a match that good every 10,000 basepairs on average on that strand.

enumParam.name: tfbs_num_sites
enumParam.help: Choose the minimum number of sites per gene that meet your other criteria.

enumParam.name: tfbs_direction
enumParam.prompt: Binding Site location relative to 5' end of gene
enumParam.help: Choose whether the peak should be upstream or downstream of the 5' end of the gene.

stringParam.name: chip_distance
stringParam.help: Enter the maximum distance you want to allow the center of the peak to be from the 5' end of the gene. Note that the larger the value entered here (3000 bp maximum) the greater the chance for aberrant results.

stringParam.name: chip_score
stringParam.help: The score for a peak is the average of the normalized log ratio values for all the probes covered in the peak (the log ratio value of the probe used in computing the average is normalized with respect to all the probes).

enumParam.name: chip_reps
enumParam.help: Choose the number of peaks for this antibody/treatment. Note that the PLK (TypeII) strain was only done with one replicate. Note that this is the total number of peaks per antibody/treatment pair.

enumParam.name: chip_direction
enumParam.prompt: Peak location relative to 5' end of gene
enumParam.help: Choose whether the peak should be upstream or downstream of the 5' end of the gene.

flatVocabParam.name: chip_strains
flatVocabParam.help: Choose a strain from which the samples were prepared.

flatVocabParam.name: chip_replicates
flatVocabParam.help: Choose 'Yes' if you would like to fetch genes that have evidence from both replicates.

flatVocabParam.name: chip_replicates_plasmo
flatVocabParam.help: Choose 'Yes' if you would like to fetch genes that have evidence from both replicates.

flatVocabParam.name: chip_experiment
flatVocabParam.help: Choose a ChIP on chip assay/experiment

stringParam.name: st_max_five_prime_distance
stringParam.help: Enter the maximum distance you want to allow the tag to be from the 5' end of the gene. This is assuming that the gene model does not contain the entire transcribed region which is frequently the case. Note that the larger the value entered here (1000 bp maximum) the greater the chance for aberrant results.

stringParam.name: st_max_three_prime_distance
stringParam.help: Enter the maximum distance you want to allow the tag to be from the 3' end of the gene. This is assuming that the gene model does not contain the entire transcribed region which is frequently the case. Note that the larger the value entered here (1000 bp maximum) the greater the chance for aberrant results.

stringParam.name: st_min_tag_count
stringParam.help: Enter the minimum frequency of the SAGE tags meeting your criteria. Tags must have this minimum frequency in at least one selected SAGE library.

stringParam.name: st_max_occurrences
stringParam.help: Enter the maximum number of times the sequence for this SAGE tag is present in the genome.

enumParam.name: sense_antisense
enumParam.help: Choose whether to consider SAGE tags which are sense or antisense relative to the genes returned.

enumParam.name: plasmo_new_product
enumParam.help: Choose whether to return genes with new product names.

enumParam.name: plasmo_new_ec
enumParam.help: Choose whether to return genes with EC numbers assigned at workshop

enumParam.name: plasmo_new_go
enumParam.help: Choose whether to return genes with GO terms assigned at the workshop.

enumParam.name: plasmo_new_model
enumParam.help: Choose whether to return genes with altered gene models.

enumParam.name: plasmo_annot_status
enumParam.prompt: Status change from old (release 5.5) to new (release 6.0) annotation
enumParam.help: Choose which genes to return based on their change in status from old to new annotation.

stringParam.name: sage_tag_min_r
stringParam.help: Choose a minimum R value to be returned. Stekel et al.â€™s R-statistic (Stekel, Git, and Falciani 2000) scores SAGE tags on differential expression among libraries (more variable tags have higher R values), with no assignment of significance values.

flatVocabParam.name: ec_number_pattern
flatVocabParam.help: Enzyme Commission numbers describe enzymes hierarchically by the class of rections they catalize. Use '-' as a wildcard in place of numbers to denote partial EC Numbers.

stringParam.name: num_exons_gte
stringParam.help: Which genes are annotated as containing introns? One easy way to do this search is to look for genes with more than one annotated exon. Enter a minimum of exons you would like to search for as an integer, e.g. '3'.

stringParam.name: num_exons_lte
stringParam.help: Enter a maximum number of exons you would like to search for as an integer, e.g. '3'.

stringParam.name: min_number_est_aligned
stringParam.help: Enter the minimum number of ESTs that must align from the libraries selected to return a gene.

flatVocabParam.name: cowmanSample
flatVocabParam.help: Choose a study for which genes are to be fetched.

flatVocabParam.name: diffMeanExpr_reference
flatVocabParam.help: Select a reference assay/study to be compared.

flatVocabParam.name: diffMeanExpr_comparitor
flatVocabParam.help: Select an assay against which the reference study/assay is to be compared.

stringParam.name: confidence
stringParam.help: PaGE reports 1 - False Discovery Rate (FDR), which is called the "confidence" for the predictions. The FDR of a set of predictions is the expected percent of false predictions in the set of predictions. For example if the algorithm returns 100 genes with a false discovery rate of .3 (confidence=0.7) then we should expect 70 of them to be correct.

stringParam.name: fold_change
stringParam.help: Enter a non-negative number. NOTE: Fold change is reported in the summary as positive numbers for up-regulated genes and negative numbers for down-regulated genes

stringParam.name: correlation
stringParam.help: Enter a non-negative number. NOTE: Correlation is reported in the summary as positive numbers for positively correlated genes and negative numbers for negatively correlated genes

enumParam.name: regulated_dir
enumParam.help: For ConditionA vs. ConditionB, select up-regulated for genes where ConditionA > ConditionB and select down-regulated for genes where ConditionB > ConditionA.

enumParam.name: correlation_dir
enumParam.help: There are two types or directions of correlation (two patterns that correlations can follow).

enumParam.name: expressionPercentileSamples
enumParam.help: The percentile was calculated on the mean of each sample group over all the spots on the array.

stringParam.name: percentile
stringParam.help: Expression percentile reflects the expression level of one gene compared to other genes from the same array for one time point. Genes are returned if ANY time point in the series has a percentile above the chosen value.

stringParam.name: min_tm
stringParam.help: Proteins may have none, one or more transmembrane domains. Please enter a minimum number of predicted transmembrane domains to start your search.

stringParam.name: max_tm
stringParam.help: Proteins may have none, one or more transmembrane domains. Please enter a maximum number of predicted transmembrane domains to start your search.

stringParam.name: min_sigp_sum_score
stringParam.help: SignalP-NN (neural network) provides four scores and a conclusion for each such that the conclusion is 1 if the score meets a certain criteria and 0 otherwise. The SignalP summary conclusion is the sum of the four conclusions generated by SignalP, thus four is the highest score possible. We consider a summary conclusion score of three to be significant

stringParam.name: min_sigp_d_score
stringParam.help: The D-score is the average of the S-mean and Y-max score from SignalP-NN

stringParam.name: min_sigp_signal_probability
stringParam.help: Signal Probability from SignalP-HMM

flatVocabParam.name: geneType
flatVocabParam.help: 'Repeat genes' refers to the most common 59 repeat families identified in the assembly. They constitute ~39 Mb of the genome and can be classified as (1) virus-like, (2) transposon-like, (3) retrotransposon-like, and (4) unclassified (no similarity to known proteins, peptide motifs, or nucleotide sequences). Most are present in hundreds of copies (average ~660) and each family is extraordinarily homogenous, with a ~2.5% average polymorphism.

Select a gene type:

TypeValid for:
snRNA encodingAmoeba. Giardia, Microsporidia, Plasmo, TriTryp
tRNA encodingall
ncRNAAmoeba. Microsporidia, TriTryp
rRNA encodingall
snoRNA encodingCrypto, Giardia, TriTryp
misc RNACrypto, Plasmo
SRP RNA encodingGiardia
RNase P RNAGiardia
RNase MRP RNAGiardia
repeat regionTrich
scRNA encodingTriTryp

enumParam.name: BlastDatabaseType
enumParam.help: The type of the target database (eg CDS, Transcripts, Proteins)

enumParam.name: epitope_confidence
enumParam.help: Epitopes are mapped to genes in @PROJECT_ID@ using high quality BLAST similarities (percent identity >= 97%) between the GenBank proteins listed on IEDB and the proteins found in @PROJECT_ID@, and exact string matching. Confidence levels are assigned to each set of epitopes based on the quality of this mapping. A high confidence is assigned to a set where all of the epitopes are found on a given BLAST hit. A medium confidence is assigned to a set where either some, but not all, of the epitopes in a set are found on a given BLAST hit, or where all of the epitopes in a set are found in a given protein, but the protein was not identified as a match by BLAST. A low confidence is assigned to sets where some, but not all, of the epitopes are found in a given protein, but the protein was not identified by BLAST. Choose one or more assigned confidence levels to search for epitopes in.

enumValue.internal: 'Full Set Not on Blast Hit','Not Full Set On Blast Hit'

stringParam.name: genbank_accession
stringParam.help: Enter a GenBank Accession number

stringParam.name: distanceFromTelomere
stringParam.help: Enter an upper bound on the distance.

stringParam.name: max_centromere_distance
stringParam.help: Enter an upper bound on the distance

enumParam.name: start_from
enumParam.help: Select whether to measure the start point from the beginning or end of the sequence

enumParam.name: end_from
enumParam.help: Select whether to measure the end point from the beginning or end of the sequence

enumParam.name: protein_dataset
enumParam.help: Select whether to measure the end point from the beginning or end of the sequence

stringParam.name: pvalue_cutoff
stringParam.prompt: BLAST P-value less than 10 to the
stringParam.help: Only consider BLAST similarities with a P-value less than ten to the given power.

flatVocabParam.name: clades
flatVocabParam.prompt: With similarity to PDB Proteins from

stringParam.name: accession
stringParam.help: Enter a GenBank, RefSeq, or SwissProt accession number

stringParam.name: min_coil
stringParam.help: Choose a lower bound on the coil percentage. Only genes coding for proteins whose secondary structure contains at least this percentage of coil will be returned.

stringParam.name: max_coil
stringParam.help: Choose an upper bound on the coil percentage. Only genes coding for proteins whose secondary structure contains no more than this percentage of coil will be returned.

stringParam.name: min_strand
stringParam.help: Choose a lower bound on the strand percentage. Only genes coding for proteins whose secondary structure contains at least this percentage of strand will be returned.

stringParam.name: max_strand
stringParam.help: Choose an upper bound on the strand percentage. Only genes coding for proteins whose secondary structure contains no more than this percentage of strand will be returned.

stringParam.name: min_helix
stringParam.help: Choose a lower bound on the helix percentage. Only genes coding for proteins whose secondary structure contains at least this percentage of helix will be returned.

stringParam.name: max_helix
stringParam.help: Choose an upper bound on the helix percentage. Only genes coding for proteins whose secondary structure contains no more than this percentage of helix will be returned.

stringParam.name: ProfileGeneId
stringParam.help: The Gene Id

enumParam.name: ProfileDistanceMethod
enumParam.help: The method used to calculate the similarity distance

stringParam.name: ProfileNumToReturn
stringParam.help: The number of genes in the result

enumParam.name: ProfileSearchGoal
enumParam.help: The searching goal of the profile similarity query

enumParam.name: ProfileProfileSet
enumParam.help: Choose the strain of the profile to search against

enumValue.internal: M.White Cell Cycle Microarray spline smoothed interpolated

enumParam.name: ProfileTimeShift
enumParam.help: Whether to allow time shifting or not

enumParam.name: ProfileScaleData
enumParam.help: Whether to scale result data into [0..1] or not

enumParam.name: ProfileMinShift
enumParam.help: The minimum allowed time shift

enumParam.name: ProfileMaxShift
enumParam.help: The maximum allowed time shift

enumParam.name: text_fields
enumParam.help: Choose which text fields to search.

stringParam.name: max_pvalue
stringParam.prompt: Max p-value exponent (BLAST Hits v. NRDB)
stringParam.help: Only applicable to the 'Similar proteins' field. Use this to filter away BLAST hits that are below a threshold of significance, so you only search the descriptions of significantly similar proteins.

stringParam.name: e_value
stringParam.help: Enter the maximum E value allowed to report domain matches.

flatVocabParam.name: domain_database
flatVocabParam.help: Choose one of the constituent databases of InterPro.

flatVocabParam.name: domain_accession
flatVocabParam.help: Start typing and then choose a domain from the list of domains that come up. As you type the list gets narrowed to match only those entries that match what you have typed.

flatVocabParam.name: day_and_strain
flatVocabParam.help: Choose one or more strain/day combination

enumParam.name: gl_exprnsample
enumParam.help: Choose one or more comparisons. Choosing more than one will result in the union of results.

enumValue.term: PaGE Analysis - 40 degrees C vs. Control
enumValue.internal: PaGE Analysis - 40 degrees C vs. Control

enumParam.name: gl_exprnsample_two
enumParam.help: Choose one or more comparisons. Choosing more than one will result in the union of results.

enumValue.term: Hehl encystation 7 hour lipid starvation page analysis
enumValue.internal: Hehl encystation 7 hour lipid starvation page analysis

enumParam.name: lineages_a
enumParam.help: Numerator in Fold Change Calculation. fold change greater than 0 means the expression is higher in this sample

enumParam.name: lineages_b
enumParam.help: Denominator in Fold Change Calculation. fold chage less than 0 means the expression is higher in this sample

enumParam.name: subType
enumParam.help: Genes with little or no evidence that overlapped (or were subsumed by) larger genes for which there was evidence such as protein similarities, expression evidence from EST alignments, SAGE or proteomics data were marked as deprecated. These genes will likely be removed in a subsequent release of GiardiaDB (and in GenBank) unless additional evidence is provided indicating they should be moved into the real gene category. Please add a user comment to those deprecated genes for which you have experimental evidence indicating that they are real.

enumParam.name: sage_tag_library_name
enumParam.help: Click the + to select specific experiments or use the tree box to select all for the chosen organism.

sqlQuery.name: PhyleticIndentMap
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT (level-1) as internal, three_letter_abbrev as term FROM apidb.orthomclTaxon WHERE parent_id IS NOT NULL START WITH orthomcl_taxon_id = (select min(orthomcl_taxon_id) from apidb.orthomclTaxon) CONNECT BY parent_id = prior orthomcl_taxon_id ORDER BY depth_first_index ASC, level ASC, three_letter_abbrev ASC

sqlQuery.name: TfbsNames
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct bf.name as term, bf.name as internal from apidb.tfbsgene bg, dots.bindingsitefeature bf where bg.tfbs_na_feature_id = bf.na_feature_id order by name

sqlQuery.name: PhyleticTermMap
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT three_letter_abbrev as term, name as internal FROM apidb.orthomcltaxon ORDER BY depth_first_index ASC, three_letter_abbrev ASC

sqlQuery.name: ChIPAntibodyToxo
sqlQuery.sql: select replace(display,' - none','') as display, internal as internal, term as term from (select distinct cpp.antibody||'|'||cpp.treatment as term, cpp.antibody||'|'||cpp.treatment as internal, CASE WHEN cpp.antibody like '%H3%' THEN '(1) '||cpp.antibody||' - '||cpp.treatment ELSE '(2) ' ||cpp.antibody||' - '||cpp.treatment||' - No Replicates ' END as display from apidb.chipprotocolparams cpp where cpp.strain = $$chip_strains$$ and cpp.protocol_type = 'called_peaks')

sqlQuery.name: ChIPReplicates
sqlQuery.sql: select term,internal,display from (select 'Yes' as term, 1 as internal,'Yes' as display from (select count(distinct replicate) as replicates from apidb.chipprotocolparams where strain = $$chip_strains$$ and protocol_type = 'called_peaks') cpp where cpp.replicates > 1 union select 'No' as term, 0 as internal, 'No' as display from (select count(distinct replicate) as replicates from apidb.chipprotocolparams where strain = $$chip_strains$$ and protocol_type = 'called_peaks') cpp where cpp.replicates > 1 union select 'No' as term, 0 as internal, 'Not Applicable' as display from (select count(distinct replicate) as replicates from apidb.chipprotocolparams where strain = $$chip_strains$$ and protocol_type = 'called_peaks') cpp where cpp.replicates in (1,0)) order by display asc

sqlQuery.name: PlasmoChIPReplicates
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct CASE WHEN $$chip_experiment$$ = 'Scherf' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as term, CASE WHEN $$chip_experiment$$ = 'Scherf' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'Not Applicable' END as display, CASE WHEN $$chip_experiment$$ = 'Scherf' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as internal from dual union select distinct 0 as term, CASE WHEN $$chip_experiment$$ = 'Scherf' THEN 'No' ELSE 'Not Applicable' END as display, 0 as internal from dual order by display desc

sqlQuery.name: ChIPAntibodyPlasmo
sqlQuery.sql: select term, CASE WHEN display like '%H3K4%' THEN display || ' (only wild type)' WHEN display like '%H4K20%' THEN display || ' (only wild type)' ELSE display END as display, internal from (select distinct CASE WHEN $$chip_experiment$$ = 'Scherf' THEN cpp.antibody ELSE 'Not Applicable' END as term, CASE WHEN $$chip_experiment$$ = 'Scherf' THEN cpp.antibody ELSE 'Not Applicable' END as display, lower (CASE WHEN $$chip_experiment$$ = 'Scherf' THEN cpp.antibody ELSE 'Not Applicable' END) as internal from apidb.chipprotocolparams cpp where cpp.antibody is not null and cpp.protocol_type = 'called_peaks')

sqlQuery.name: ChIPGenotype
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct CASE WHEN $$chip_experiment$$ = 'Scherf' THEN cpp.genotype ELSE 'Not Applicable' END as term, replace (CASE WHEN $$chip_experiment$$ = 'Scherf' THEN cpp.genotype ELSE 'Not Applicable' END,'_',' ') as display, lower (CASE WHEN $$chip_experiment$$ = 'Scherf' THEN cpp.genotype ELSE 'Not Applicable' END) as internal from apidb.chipprotocolparams cpp where cpp.genotype is not null and cpp.protocol_type = 'called_peaks'

sqlQuery.name: ChIp_Assays
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct cpp.strain as term, cpp.strain as internal, CASE WHEN cpp.strain = 'CTG' THEN 'CTG (TypeIII)' WHEN cpp.strain = 'RH' THEN 'RH (TypeI)' WHEN cpp.strain = 'PLK' THEN 'PLK (TypeII)' END as display from apidb.chipprotocolparams cpp where cpp.protocol_type = 'called_peaks' and cpp.strain is not null

sqlQuery.name: ChIp_Experiments
sqlQuery.sql: select term,internal,display from (select 'Histone modifications in wild type and Sir2 knock-outs' as term, 'Scherf' as internal,'(1) Histone modifications in wild type and Sir2 knock-outs' as display from dual union select 'Genome-wide assoc. of (Hp-1) with virulence gene clusters' as term, 'Voss' as internal, '(2) Genome-wide assoc. of Hp-1 with virulence gene clusters' as display from dual) order by display asc

sqlQuery.name: PVTimeSeriesFoldChangeProfileSet
sqlQuery.sql: select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, CASE WHEN p.name like '%normalized_averaged 1%' THEN 'Patient 1' WHEN p.name like '%normalized_averaged 2%' THEN 'Patient 2' WHEN p.name like '%normalized_averaged 3%' THEN 'Patient 3' END as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name in ('ZB Pvivax time series normalized_averaged 1','ZB Pvivax time series normalized_averaged 2','ZB Pvivax time series normalized_averaged 3')

sqlQuery.name: PfDuffyFoldChangeTP
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.profile_element_name_id as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, ps.name as parentTerm, replace(pen.name,'h',' hours') as display from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where ps.name = 'Pf_RNASeq_Newbold_RSRC' and pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: TimeSeriesFoldChangeProfileSetFl
sqlQuery.sql: /* select '0' as term, 0 as internal, 'Choose One' as display from dual union */ select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'VEG CO2-starvation bradyzoite-inducing conditions (extended)' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'expression profiles of VEG strain CO2-starvation bradyzoite inducing conditions' union select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'Pru CO2-starvation bradyzoite-inducing conditions (extended)' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'expression profiles of Pru dHXGPRT strain CO2-starvation bradyzoite inducing conditions'

select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'Replicate 1' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'Linfantum promastigote time-course biorep01' union select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'Replicate 2' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'Linfantum promastigote time-course biorep02'

sqlQuery.name: LdTimeSeriesFoldChangeProfileSet
sqlQuery.sql: select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'Replicate 1' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'Linfantum promastigote time-course biorep01' union select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'Replicate 2' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'Linfantum promastigote time-course biorep02'

sqlQuery.name: TimeSeriesFoldChangeProfileSetPD
sqlQuery.sql: /* select 'Choose One' as term, -1 as internal, 'Choose One' as display from dual union */ select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'RH Alkaline Bradyzoite-inducing conditions' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'expression profiles of RH delta-HXGPRT delta-UPRT strain Alkaline bradyzoite-inducing conditions (media pH 8.2)' union select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'Pru Sodium Nitroprusside bradyzoite-inducing conditions' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'expression profiles of Pru dHXGPRT strain sodium nitroprusside bradyzoite-inducing conditions' union select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'Pru CO2-starvation bradyzoite-inducing conditions' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'expression profiles of Pru dHXGPRT strain CO2-starvation bradyzoite-inducing conditions' union select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'Pru Alkaline bradyzoite-inducing conditions' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'expression profiles of Pru dHXGPRT strain Alkaline bradyzoite-inducing conditions (media pH 8.2)'

sqlQuery.name: TbTimeSeriesFoldChangeProfileSet
sqlQuery.sql: select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, '(1) T. brucei Microarray Time Series' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'Expression profiling of T. brucei microarray data from Christine Clayton' union select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, '(2) T.brucei Differentiation Time Series' as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name = 'Expression profiling of T. brucei differentiation series'

sqlQuery.name: TimeSeriesFoldChangeOnePd
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.profile_element_name_id as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, ps.name as parentTerm, pen.name as display from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where (($$ts_fc_profile_one_pd$$ = 0 and ps.name = 'expression profiles of Pru dHXGPRT strain Alkaline bradyzoite-inducing conditions (media pH 8.2)') or $$ts_fc_profile_one_pd$$ != 0 and ps.profile_set_id = $$ts_fc_profile_one_pd$$) and pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: CellCycleFoldChangeMW
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.profile_element_name_id as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, ps.name as parentTerm, pen.name as display from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where ps.name = 'M.White Cell Cycle Microarray spline smoothed 12 pts' and pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: TimeSeriesFoldChangeTwoPd
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.profile_element_name_id as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, ps.name as parentTerm, pen.name as display from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where (($$ts_fc_profile_two_pd$$ = 0 and ps.name = 'expression profiles of Pru dHXGPRT strain Alkaline bradyzoite-inducing conditions (media pH 8.2)') or $$ts_fc_profile_two_pd$$ != 0 and ps.profile_set_id = $$ts_fc_profile_two_pd$$) and pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: TimeSeriesFoldChangeTb
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.profile_element_name_id as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, ps.name as parentTerm, CASE WHEN pen.name like '%sl%' then 'Slender' WHEN pen.name like '%bf-ld%' then 'Blood form - low density' WHEN pen.name like '%bf-hd%' then 'Blood form - high density' ELSE pen.name END as display from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where ps.profile_set_id = $$tb_fc_profile_pd$$ and pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: TimeSeriesFoldChangeOneFl
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.profile_element_name_id as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, ps.name as parentTerm, pen.name as display from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where (($$ts_fc_profile_one_fl$$ = 0 and ps.name = 'expression profiles of Pru dHXGPRT strain Alkaline bradyzoite-inducing conditions (media pH 8.2)') or $$ts_fc_profile_one_fl$$ != 0 and ps.profile_set_id = $$ts_fc_profile_one_fl$$) and pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: LdTimeSeriesFoldChangeTwoFl
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.profile_element_name_id as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, ps.name as parentTerm, pen.name as display from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where ps.profile_set_id = $$ld_fc_profile_two_fl$$ and pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: TimeSeriesFoldChangeTwoFl
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.profile_element_name_id as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, ps.name as parentTerm, pen.name as display from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where (($$ts_fc_profile_two_fl$$ = 0 and ps.name = 'expression profiles of Pru dHXGPRT strain Alkaline bradyzoite-inducing conditions (media pH 8.2)') or $$ts_fc_profile_two_fl$$ != 0 and ps.profile_set_id = $$ts_fc_profile_two_fl$$) and pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: TimeSeriesFoldChangeMatt
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.profile_element_name_id as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, ps.name as parentTerm, pen.name as display from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where ps.name = 'expression profiles of T. gondii Matt_Tz-Bz time series' and pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: EhistTimeSeriesFCProfileSet
sqlQuery.sql: select p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, CASE WHEN p.name like '%Affy%' THEN 'Strains labeled with Affymetrix amplification protocol <sup>1</sup>' WHEN p.name like '%Nugen%' THEN 'Strains labeled with Nugen SPIA amplification protocol <sup>1,2</sup>' END as display from apidb.profileset p where p.name in ('EhistolyticaAffyProfiles','EhistolyticaNugenProfiles')

sqlQuery.name: EHTimeSeriesFoldChangeTP
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.profile_element_name_id as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, ps.name as parentTerm, CASE WHEN (pen.name like '%MS75-3544%' OR pen.name like '%HM-1:IMSS - Trophs TYI%' OR pen.name like '%Rahman - Trophs TYI%' OR pen.name like '%200:NIH%' OR pen.name like '%Rahman Trophs TYI%' OR pen.name like '%2592100%') THEN '' || pen.name || '<sup>1</sup>' ELSE '' || pen.name || '<sup>2</sup>' END as display from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where ps.profile_set_id = $$profileSetEHisto$$ and pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: EcNumberList
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ec.ec_number AS internal, ec.ec_number AS term, ec.ec_number || ' (' || ec.description || ')' AS display FROM sres.enzymeClass ec, apidb.TypeAheadCounts tac WHERE ec.ec_number = tac.option_id AND tac.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@'

sqlQuery.name: GoTermList
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT gt.go_id AS internal, gt.go_id AS term, gt.go_id || ' : ' || gt.name AS display, gt.minimum_level, length(gt.name) FROM sres.GoTerm gt, sres.gorelationship gr, dots.goassociation ga, apidb.TypeAheadCounts tac WHERE gt.go_term_id = gr.parent_term_id AND ga.go_term_id = gr.child_term_id AND tac.option_id = gt.go_id AND tac.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' ORDER BY gt.minimum_level, length(gt.name)

sqlQuery.name: DomainAccession
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT dr.primary_identifier AS internal, dr.primary_identifier || ' : ' || dr.secondary_identifier AS term, dr.primary_identifier || ' : ' || dr.secondary_identifier || ' ' || dr.remark AS display, dr.secondary_identifier,dr.remark FROM sres.DbRef dr, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr, sres.ExternalDatabase ed, apidb.TypeAheadCounts tac WHERE dr.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id AND edr.external_database_release_id IN ($$domain_database$$) AND tac.option_id = dr.primary_identifier AND tac.project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' ORDER BY lower(dr.secondary_identifier),lower(dr.remark)

sqlQuery.name: GiardiaAnalyses
sqlQuery.sql: select a.analysis_id internal, replace(a.name, 'PaGE Analysis - ', '') as term from rad.ANALYSIS a, rad.PROTOCOL p where p.protocol_id = a.protocol_id and p.name = 'PaGE'

sqlQuery.name: GeneTypes
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct REPLACE(REPLACE(regexp_replace(ga.gene_type, 'non[ |_]protein[_| ]coding', 'misc RNA'), '_encoding', ''), '_', ' ') AS term, ga.gene_type as internal from apidb.geneattributes ga

sqlQuery.name: ExtraerythrocyticStages
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct name AS term, name AS internal FROM apidb.profileElementName WHERE name IN ('Sporozoite', 'Gametocyte') ORDER BY internal

sqlQuery.name: IntraerythrocyticStages
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct name AS term, element_order AS internal FROM apidb.profileElementName WHERE name IN ('Early Ring', 'Late Ring', 'Early Schizogony', 'Late Schizogony', 'Early Trophozoite', 'Late Trophozoite', 'Merozoite') ORDER BY internal

sqlQuery.name: Reagents
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT term, internal FROM (SELECT reagent_type AS term, reagent_type AS internal, rownum AS ord FROM (SELECT DISTINCT lower(dr.secondary_identifier) AS reagent_type FROM sres.DbRef dr, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr, sres.ExternalDatabase ed WHERE dr.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id AND ed.name in ('MR4DBxRefs','Pf_MR4Reagents_RSRC','AntibodyDBxRefs') ORDER BY lower(dr.secondary_identifier)) UNION SELECT 'any' AS term, 'any' AS internal, 0 AS ord FROM dual) ORDER BY ord

sqlQuery.name: Clades
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT tn.name AS term, taxon_id AS internal FROM sres.taxonname tn WHERE tn.name IN ('Archaea', 'Eukaryota', 'Apicomplexa', 'Chordata', 'Bacteria')

sqlQuery.name: Clades
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT tn.name AS term, taxon_id AS internal FROM sres.taxonname tn WHERE tn.name IN ('Archaea', 'Eukaryota', 'Bacteria', 'Kinetoplastida') ORDER by tn.name desc

sqlQuery.name: DomainDatabase
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ed.name AS term, edr.external_database_release_id AS internal FROM sres.DbRef dr, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr, sres.ExternalDatabase ed WHERE dr.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id AND dr.db_ref_id IN (SELECT draf.db_ref_id FROM dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature draf, core.AlgorithmInvocation ainv, core.AlgorithmImplementation aimp WHERE df.aa_feature_id = draf.aa_feature_id AND df.row_alg_invocation_id = ainv.algorithm_invocation_id AND ainv.algorithm_implementation_id = aimp.algorithm_implementation_id AND aimp.executable = 'ApiCommonData::Load::Plugin::InsertInterproscanResults') UNION SELECT 'Choose one:' AS term, -1 AS internal FROM dual ORDER BY term

sqlQuery.name: DayAndStrain
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.profile_element_name_id AS internal, DECODE(ps.name, 'winzeler_NF54_pct', 'Strain NF54', 'winzeler_3D7_pct', 'Strain 3D7', 'winzeler_3D7_MACpct', 'Strain 3D7 (MACS-purified)', ps.name) || REPLACE(pen.name, 'Day', ' Day ') AS term FROM apidb.profileSet ps, apidb.profileElementName pen WHERE ps.name IN ('winzeler_3D7_MACpct', 'winzeler_3D7_pct','winzeler_NF54_pct') AND ps.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id ORDER BY ps.name, pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: GlExprStudiesStress
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'Stress Response by temperature or varying DTT concentrations' as display FROM apidb.profileset p WHERE p.name = 'Stress Response in Giardia lamblia Trophozoites-Averaged' UNION SELECT p.name as term, p.profile_set_id as internal, 'Stress Response by varying DTT incubation time' as display FROM apidb.profileset p WHERE p.name = 'Stress response Dynamics in Trophozoites (time series)-Averaged'

sqlQuery.name: GlExpressionSamplesStress
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, ps.name as parentTerm, pen.name as display from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where ps.profile_set_id = $$gl_expr_studies_stress$$ and pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: GlExpressionSamplesEncyst
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, ps.name as parentTerm, pen.name as display from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where ps.name = 'Hehl encystation expression profile' and pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: ringqvistSample
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, pen.name as display FROM apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps WHERE pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id AND ps.name = 'Profiles of G.lamblia Ringqvist array data' order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: ringqvistStudy
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, pen.name as display FROM apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps WHERE pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id AND ps.name in ('Percents of G.lamblia Ringqvist array data(red)', 'Percents of G.lamblia Ringqvist array data(green)') order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: kappeAnalysis
sqlQuery.sql: select a.name as term, a.analysis_id as internal from rad.protocol p, rad.analysis a where p.name = 'Kappe Fold Change' and p.protocol_id = a.protocol_id order by a.name

sqlQuery.name: cowmanSample
sqlQuery.sql: Select distinct pen.name as term, pen.name as internal, pen.name as display From ApiDB.ProfileElementName pen, ApiDB.ProfileSet ps Where ps.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id And ps.name = 'Profiles of Cowman Invasion KO-averaged' Order by pen.name

sqlQuery.name: suCqPercentileSample
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, pen.name as term from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where ps.name = 'Percents of E-GEOD-10022 array from Su' and ps.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: cowmanSir2PercentileSample
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, pen.name as term from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where ps.name = 'Percentiles of of E-TABM-438 from Cowman' and ps.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: cowmanSir2Sample
sqlQuery.sql: select pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, pen.name as term from apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where ps.name = 'Profiles of E-TABM-438 from Cowman' and ps.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: suCqComparisons
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT a.name as term, a.analysis_id as internal FROM rad.analysis a, rad.protocol p WHERE a.protocol_id = p.protocol_id AND p.name = 'PaGE' AND a.name like '106/1%' ORDER BY a.name

sqlQuery.name: RNASeqPfalSamples
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, CASE WHEN pen.name ='3D7' THEN 'Reference: ' || pen.name WHEN pen.name ='PL01' THEN 'Sample 1: ' || pen.name WHEN pen.name ='PL02' THEN 'Sample 2: ' || pen.name ELSE pen.name END as display FROM apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps WHERE pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id AND ps.name = 'Profiles of P.falciparum duffy mRNA Seq data' order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: RNASeqRBCPfalFc
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, replace (pen.name,'h',' hours') as display FROM apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps WHERE pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id AND ps.name = 'Profiles of P.falciparum Stunnenberg mRNA Seq data' order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: RNASeqPfalFcOnePd
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, 'Parasites from children' as display FROM apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps WHERE pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id AND ps.name = 'Profiles of P.falciparum duffy mRNA Seq data' AND pen.name = 'PL02'

sqlQuery.name: RNASeqPfalFcTwoPd
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, 'Parasites from mothers' as display FROM apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps WHERE pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id AND ps.name = 'Profiles of P.falciparum duffy mRNA Seq data' AND pen.name = 'PL01'

sqlQuery.name: ExprnPercentilePfSampleRnaSeqTP
sqlQuery.sql: Select pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, pen.profile_element_name_id as term, replace(pen.name,'h',' hours') as display from apidb.profileelementname pen,apidb.profileset ps where ps.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id and ps.name = 'Percents of P. falciparum Stunnenberg mRNA Seq data' order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: ExpressionPercentilPfSampleRnaSeq
sqlQuery.sql: Select pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, pen.profile_element_name_id as term, CASE WHEN pen.name ='PL01' THEN 'Parasites from mothers' WHEN pen.name ='PL02' THEN 'Parasites from children' ELSE pen.name END as display from apidb.profileelementname pen,apidb.profileset ps where ps.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id and ps.name = 'Percents of P.falciparum duffy mRNA Seq data' and not pen.name ='3D7' order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: whiteSample
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT a.name as term, a.name as internal FROM rad.analysis a, rad.protocol p WHERE a.protocol_id = p.protocol_id AND p.name = 'Toxo_Strain_Gene_Expressions'

sqlQuery.name: ToxoExprStudies
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT p.name as internal, CASE WHEN p.name = 'Paul Davis Expression Percentile' THEN 'Tachyzoite Strains' WHEN p.name = 'Toxo_Strain_Gene_Expressions' THEN 'Tachyzoite or Differentiated Bradyzoite' ELSE p.name END as term FROM rad.protocol p, rad.analysis a, rad.expressionprofile ep WHERE p.protocol_id = a.protocol_id AND ep.analysis_id = a.analysis_id ORDER BY p.name

sqlQuery.name: ToxoExpressionSamples
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT a.name as term, a.name as internal FROM rad.analysis a, rad.protocol p WHERE a.protocol_id = p.protocol_id AND p.name = '$$toxo_expr_studies$$'

sqlQuery.name: RNASeqBruceiLifeStage
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, CASE WHEN pen.name ='bf' THEN 'Blood form' WHEN pen.name = 'pf wt' THEN 'Procyclic form - wild type' ELSE pen.name END as display FROM apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps WHERE pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id AND ps.name = 'T.brucei George Cross RNA Sequence Profiles' order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: LifeCycStgCruziPage
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, pen.name as display FROM apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps WHERE pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id AND ps.name = 'Profiles of T.cruzi Tarleton Rick array data' order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: LifeCycStgLmajorPage
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT a.analysis_id as term, a.analysis_id as internal, a.name as display FROM rad.analysis a where (name = 'PNA - Metacyclic Promastigote vs. Early Log Procyclic Promastigote' or name = 'Lesion Derived Amastigote vs. Early Log Procyclic Promastigote')

sqlQuery.name: LifeCycStgTbrucei_DRBD3
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT analysis_id as term, analysis_id as internal, replace (a.name,'TbDRBD3 RNAi','TbDRBD3-depleted Induced vs Uninduced') as display FROM rad.analysis a WHERE a.name like '%TbDRBD3%'

sqlQuery.name: LifeCycStgBruceiPage
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pen.name as term, pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, CASE WHEN pen.name = 'pf_stat' THEN 'PCF Stat' WHEN pen.name = 'pf_log' THEN 'PCF Log' WHEN pen.name = 'sl' THEN 'Slender' WHEN pen.name = 'st' THEN 'Stumpy' WHEN pen.name = 'bf' THEN 'Blood Form' ELSE pen.name END as display FROM apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps WHERE pen.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id AND ps.name = 'Expression profiling of Tbrucei five life cycle stages' order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: BruceiExperimentMaxPercentile
sqlQuery.sql: select max(pe.value) as term, max(pe.value) as internal from apidb.profile p, apidb.profileelement pe, apidb.profileelementname pen, apidb.profileset ps where ps.profile_set_id = $$expressionPercentileExptsBrucei$$ and p.profile_set_id = ps.profile_set_id and ps.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id and p.profile_id = pe.profile_id and pe.element_order = pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: ExpressionPercentilSampleRnaSeq
sqlQuery.sql: Select pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, pen.profile_element_name_id as term, case when pen.name = 'pf wt' then 'Procyclic Form' when pen.name = 'bf' then 'Blood Form' else pen.name end as display from apidb.profileelementname pen,apidb.profileset ps where ps.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id and ps.name = 'T.brucei George Cross RNA Sequence Profiles Percentile' order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: Brucei5stgExperessionPecentileSamples
sqlQuery.sql: Select pen.profile_element_name_id as internal, pen.profile_element_name_id as term, case when pen.name = 'sl' then 'Slender' when pen.name = 'st' then 'Stumpy' when pen.name = 'pf_log' then 'PCF Log' when pen.name = 'pf_stat' then 'PCF Stat' when pen.name = 'bf' then 'Blood Form' else pen.name end as display from apidb.profileelementname pen,apidb.profileset ps where ps.profile_set_id = pen.profile_set_id and ps.name = 'Percents of Tbrucei five life cycle stages' order by pen.element_order

sqlQuery.name: InfantumExperessionPecentileSamples
sqlQuery.sql: Select profile_element_name_id as internal, profile_element_name_id as term, case when name = 'sl' then 'Slender' when name = 'bf-hd' then 'Blood form - high density' when name = 'bf-ld' then 'Blood form - low density' else name end as display from apidb.profileelementname where profile_set_id = $$expressionPercentileExptsInfantum$$ order by element_order

sqlQuery.name: InfantumExperessionPecentileExpts
sqlQuery.sql: Select profile_set_id as term, profile_set_id as internal, CASE WHEN name = 'Percents of the Linfantum promastigote time-course biorep01' THEN 'Replicate 1' WHEN name = 'Percents of the Linfantum promastigote time-course biorep02' THEN 'Replicate 2' ELSE name END as Display from apidb.profileset where name in ('Percents of the Linfantum promastigote time-course biorep02','Percents of the Linfantum promastigote time-course biorep01')

sqlQuery.name: CruziExperessionPecentileSamples
sqlQuery.sql: Select profile_element_name_id as internal, profile_element_name_id as term, case when name = 'sl' then 'Slender' when name = 'bf-hd' then 'Blood form - high density' when name = 'bf-ld' then 'Blood form - low density' else name end as display from apidb.profileelementname where profile_set_id = $$expressionPercentileExptsCruzi$$ order by element_order

sqlQuery.name: CruziExperessionPecentileExpts
sqlQuery.sql: Select profile_set_id as term, profile_set_id as internal, CASE WHEN name = 'Percents of T.cruzi Tarleton Rick array data(green)' THEN '(2) T.cruzi expression percentile data channel 1 (green)' WHEN name = 'Percents of T.cruzi Tarleton Rick array data(red)' THEN '(1) T.cruzi expression percentile data channel 2 (red)' ELSE name END as Display from apidb.profileset where name in ('Percents of T.cruzi Tarleton Rick array data(red)','Percents of T.cruzi Tarleton Rick array data(green)')

sqlQuery.name: BruceiExperessionPecentileSamples
sqlQuery.sql: Select profile_element_name_id as internal, profile_element_name_id as term, case when name = 'sl' then 'Slender' when name = 'bf-hd' then 'Blood form - high density' when name = 'bf-ld' then 'Blood form - low density' else name end as display from apidb.profileelementname where profile_set_id = $$expressionPercentileExptsBrucei$$ order by element_order

sqlQuery.name: BruceiExperessionPecentileExpts
sqlQuery.sql: Select profile_set_id as term, profile_set_id as internal, CASE WHEN name = 'Percentiles of T. brucei differentiation series' THEN 'Percentiles of T. brucei differentiation data' ELSE name END as Display from apidb.profileset where name in ('Percentiles of T. brucei differentiation series')

sqlQuery.name: MetabolicPathways
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT dr.primary_identifier AS internal, TRIM(REPLACE(decode(dr.lowercase_secondary_identifier, null, dr.primary_identifier, dr.lowercase_secondary_identifier), CHR(191),'')) AS display, dr.primary_identifier AS term FROM sres.DbRef dr, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr, sres.ExternalDatabase ed WHERE dr.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id AND ed.name = 'Pf_PathwayMappings_Hagai_RSRC' AND dr.primary_identifier != 'qualityControl' ORDER BY display

SELECT DISTINCT dr.primary_identifier AS internal, decode(dr.lowercase_secondary_identifier, null, dr.primary_identifier, dr.lowercase_secondary_identifier) AS display, dr.primary_identifier AS term FROM sres.DbRef dr, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr, sres.ExternalDatabase ed WHERE dr.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id AND edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id AND ed.name = 'Links to Pathway Maps' ORDER BY display

sqlQuery.name: phenotype
sqlQuery.sql: select display,term,internal,parentTerm from ( select go_term || ' (' || count(distinct gene) || ')' as display, go_term as term, go_term as internal,'' as parentTerm,count(distinct gene) as order_num from apidb.SIRNA, apidb.geneattributes ga where gene = ga.source_id group by go_term union select pato_term || ' (' || count(distinct gene) || ')' as display,go_term || pato_term as term, go_term || pato_term as internal,go_term as parentTerm, count(distinct gene) as order_num from apidb.SIRNA, apidb.geneattributes ga where gene = ga.source_id group by pato_term, go_term) order by order_num desc
